Contact with your baby
New research has found that 
involving parents as much as 
possible in the care of their 
babies can have a positive 
impact on both the baby’s and 
parents’ health and wellbeing.
You might hear health 
professionals call this family 
centred care or family 
integrated care (FIC). This 
is a more advanced form of 
involving families. FIC means 
involving the family as much 
as possible in the daily care 
and routine of their baby.
Many neonatal units now
